message: Create a monomer pair for TSMPs where one contains epoxy(C1OC1) groups and the other contains imine(NC) groups.

Monomer 2 (rich in NC): NCCOCCOCCN

message: Design a thermoset shape memory polymer using monomers that include vinyl(C=C) and hydroxyl(=O) functionalities.
